attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is a disgrace to the App Store. Also when I first opened the app I was beat up on sight because I’m black so yea there’s that...

attributes.title: ummm.... 😐
attributes.review: I genuinely downloaded this app to do research on the republican party and see things from Trump’s point of view, and when I tell you this app is scary I mean THIS APP IS SCARY.

attributes.title: awful awful awful

attributes.title: Scam
attributes.review: This is a scam. Trump is NOT the best! Do you really want every LGBTQ+ person kicked out of our country? Well then if you said no the give a one star!!!

attributes.title: No ❤️
